sentences.english: This is why the so-called Swans Hadith is definitely rejected.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为何所谓的冠鹤圣训被完全拒绝的原因。

sentences.english: Pondering on one hadith can exemplify this notion.
sentences.chinese: 可以以此观念为例深思一段圣训。

sentences.english: Not only that, I realized that there is more for me when I saw the following hadith .
sentences.chinese: 不仅如此，当我看到以下圣训时，发现它的意义更大。

sentences.english: Thus all such hadiths must have been fabricated.
sentences.chinese: 因此所有此类圣训肯定都是伪造的。

sentences.english: This hadith shows how repugnant lying is viewed in Islam.
sentences.chinese: 这段圣训表明说谎与伊斯兰如何的格格不入。

sentences.english: The priest preached to the congregation about the Sermon on the Mount.
sentences.chinese: 那位祭司就山中圣训向会众说教。

sentences.english: The Shariah is the law of Islam as given in the Quran and the example of the Prophet himself.
sentences.chinese: 沙里亚是伊斯兰律法，即古兰经和先知的圣训。

sentences.english: Paul's words, like the hadith qudsi, described forgiveness as a gift from God.
sentences.chinese: 保罗的话，就如同圣训所述那样，宽恕是安拉的恩赐。

sentences.english: This, in fact, was not reported in the Prophetic Sunnah, and there is no evidence on it.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，圣训中没有这样的传述，也没有明显的证据。

sentences.english: The spirit of constructive positivism and active endeavor is one of the principles stressed by Sunnah.
sentences.chinese: 积极自信和努力奋斗的精神是圣训强调的一个原则。

sentences.english: This principle appears in many hadiths that prohibit cursing and swearing.
sentences.chinese: 这个原则在禁止诅咒与发誓的许多圣训中曾多次出现。

definition: imperial edict/see also 上諭|上谕[shang4 yu4]
